TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit XmlResolver extends System.Object

summary.span: 解析由统一资源标识符 (URI) 命名的外部 XML 资源。

span.span: Resolves external XML resources named by a Uniform Resource Identifier (URI).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类型用于解析外部 XML 资源，如实体、 文档类型定义 (Dtd) 或架构。The type is used to resolve external XML resources, such as entities, document type definitions (DTDs), or schemas. 它也是用于进程包含和导入在可扩展样式表语言 (XSL) 样式表或 XML 架构定义语言 (XSD) 架构中找到的元素。It is also used to process include and import elements found in Extensible Stylesheet Language (XSL) style sheets or XML Schema definition language (XSD) schemas. 处理协商与资源，包括处理安全凭据、 打开与数据源连接和流或其他对象类型的形式返回资源的连接的所有方面。 handles all aspects of negotiating the connection to the resources, including handling security credentials, opening the connection to the data source, and returning the resource in the form of a stream or other object type. 对象，以调用具有解释流的任务。The object that calls has the task of interpreting the stream. 命名空间包含的两个具体实现类：The namespace includes two concrete implementations of the class: - 是中的所有类的默认冲突解决程序命名空间。 is the default resolver for all classes in the namespace. 它支持 `file://` 和 `http://` 协议以及来自 类的请求。It supports the `file://` and `http://` protocols and requests from the class. 有关扩展的类，以提高性能的示例，请参阅参考页。For examples of extending the class to improve performance, see the reference page. - 可帮助保护另一个通过包装对象和限制可访问的资源的对象。 helps secure another object by wrapping the object and restricting the resources that it can access. 例如，可以禁止访问特定的 Internet 站点或区域。For example, the can prohibit access to specific Internet sites or zones. 您可以创建并指定您自己的解析程序。You can create and specify your own resolver. 如果未指定冲突解决程序，读取器将使用默认值使用没有用户凭据。If you don't specify a resolver, the reader uses a default with no user credentials. 通过设置 属性并将 对象传递给 方法，可以指定要使用的 。You specify the to use by setting the property and passing the object to the method. 如果资源需要身份验证的系统上存储，则使用属性来指定所需的凭据。If the resource is stored on a system that requires authentication, you use the property to specify the necessary credentials. ## 提供身份验证凭据Supplying authentication credentials 包含要读取的 XML 数据的文件可能受限制的访问策略。The file that contains the XML data to read may have a restricted access policy. 如果需要身份验证才能访问网络资源，请使用 属性指定必要的凭据。If authentication is required to access a network resource, use the property to specify the necessary credentials. 如果未设置属性，凭据将设置为`null`。If the property is not set, credentials are set to `null`. 例如，假设从用于身份验证 web 请求数据时所需凭据。For example, assume that credentials are needed when requesting data from the web for authentication purposes. 除非 web 虚拟目录允许匿名访问，必须设置属性提供的凭据。Unless the web virtual directory allows anonymous access, you must set the property to supply credentials. 下面的示例创建使用对象具有默认凭据来访问`http://localhost/bookstore/inventory.xml`站点。The following example creates an object that uses an with default credentials to access the `http://localhost/bookstore/inventory.xml` site. [!code-cpp[XmlReaderSettings.cctor#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlReaderSettings.cctor/CPP/XmlReaderSettings.cctor.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[XmlReaderSettings.cctor#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlReaderSettings.cctor/CS/factory_rdr_cctor2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[XmlReaderSettings.cctor#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlReaderSettings.cctor/VB/factory_rdr_cctor2.vb#2)] 可以为不同的 Uri 提供不同的凭据，并将其添加到缓存。You can supply different credentials for different URIs and add them to a cache. 这些凭据用于检查不同 URI 的身份验证，与 XML 的原始源无关。These credentials are used to check authentication for the different URIs regardless of the original source of the XML. 下面的示例演示如何将凭据添加到缓存。The following example shows how to add credentials to a cache. [!code-csharp[XslCompiledTransform.Load#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XslCompiledTransform.Load/CS/Xslt_Load_v2.cs#11)] [!code-vb[XslCompiledTransform.Load#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XslCompiledTransform.Load/VB/Xslt_Load_v2.vb#11)] ## 安全注意事项Security considerations 使用时，请考虑以下各项类。Consider the following items when working with the class. - 对象可以包含敏感信息，例如用户凭据。 objects can contain sensitive information such as user credentials. 应为缓存时请小心对象，并不应将传递不可信的组件的对象。You should be careful when caching objects and should not pass the object to an untrusted component. - 如果您设计的类属性使用 类，该属性应定义为只写属性。If you are designing a class property that uses the class, the property should be defined as a write-only property. 该属性可以用于指定要使用的 ，但是不能用于返回 对象。The property can be used to specify the to use, but it cannot be used to return an object. - 如果你的应用程序接受不受信任的代码中的对象，不能假定 URI 传递到方法将返回的相同方法。If your application accepts objects from untrusted code, you cannot assume that the URI passed into the method will be the same as that returned by the method. 从 类派生的类可以重写 方法，并且返回的数据可以不同于原始 URI 中包含的数据。Classes derived from the class can override the method and return data that is different than what was contained in the original URI. - 你的应用程序可以缓解内存拒绝服务威胁方法通过实现，用于限制读取的字节数。Your application can mitigate memory denial of service threats to the method by implementing an that limits the number of bytes read. 这有助于防止恶意代码尝试将传递到的字节数的无限流的情况下方法。This helps guard against situations where malicious code attempts to pass an infinite stream of bytes to the method. ## Examples 下面的示例创建具有默认凭据。The following example creates an with default credentials. 一个用于读取和显示生成的数据流。A is used to read and display the resulting data stream. [!code-csharp[XmlResolver_ex#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlResolver_ex/CS/XmlResolver_ex.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XmlResolver_ex#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlResolver_ex/VB/XmlResolver_ex.vb#1)]

span.span: XML Documents and Data

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, sets the credentials used to authenticate web requests.

value.span: 用于对 Web 请求进行身份验证的凭据。

span.span: The credentials to be used to authenticate web requests.

value.span: 如果未设置该属性，则该值默认为 ；即 没有用户凭据。

span.span: If this property is not set, the value defaults to ; that is, the has no user credentials.

summary.span: 当在派生类中被重写时，将 URI 映射到包含实际资源的对象。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, maps a URI to an object that contains the actual resource.

returns.span: 流对象；如果指定了流以外的类型，则为 。

span.span: A stream object or if a type other than stream is specified.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当调用方想要将给定的 URI 映射到包含实际资源的 URI 表示的对象时使用此方法。This method is used when the caller wants to map a given URI into the object containing the actual resource that the URI represents. 返回类型是对象的协商;但是，实现必须始终支持。The type of object returned is negotiable; however, the implementation must always support . 此方法的异步版本，请参阅。For the asynchronous version of this method, see . > [!IMPORTANT] > 你的应用程序可以缓解内存拒绝服务威胁方法通过实现，用于限制读取的字节数。Your application can mitigate memory denial of service threats to the method by implementing an that limits the number of bytes read. 这有助于防止恶意代码尝试将传递到的字节数的无限流的情况下方法。This helps guard against situations where malicious code attempts to pass an infinite stream of bytes to the method. ## Examples 请参阅有关使用此方法的示例。See for an example using this method.

span.span: is not a type.

exception.span: 指定的 URI 不是一个绝对 URI。

span.span: The specified URI is not an absolute URI.
is .

exception.span: 存在运行时错误（例如中断的服务器连接）。

span.span: There is a runtime error (for example, an interrupted server connection).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这是异步版本，具有相同功能。This is the asynchronous version of , with the same functionality. 若要使用此方法，必须设置标记，用于`true`。To use this method, you must set the flag to `true`.

span.span: If relative, it combines with the to make an absolute URI.

summary.span: 当在派生类中被重写时，从基 URI 和相对 URI 解析绝对 URI。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, resolves the absolute URI from the base and relative URIs.

returns.span: 绝对 URI；如果不能解析相对 URI，则为 。

span.span: The absolute URI or if the relative URI cannot be resolved.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 绝对 URI 可能用作任何后续请求的实体的相对于此 URI 的基 URI。The absolute URI may be used as the base URI for any subsequent requests for entities that are relative to this URI. ## Examples 请参阅有关的示例，使用此方法。See for an example that uses this method.
